description: Yorito wakes up one day in school, believing that the night`s previous events with Matsuri were only a dream. Trying to remember what really happened, Yorito collapses in school and is taken home by Mana. But only after a friend at school shows her a certain photograph taken with her cellphone Mana understands that Aono is hiding something important from Yorito, and after suffering a lot the boy finally remembers what has been erased from his memory.
